name: Effecta Vicis
description:
WASD to move around
R to forfeit
Left mouse button to click on menu

(Note: The Windows build tends to run a bit better)

(NOTE THE SECOND: Apparently my level generation code can not play nice with the browser sometimes. I have no idea why it happens but it can freeze the tab. Because of this bug I have no idea how to fix, I recommend the Windows build. (it's out of my controllll ;]))

Music used:

"Laserpack" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Captain Scurvy" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Mega Hyper Ultrastorm" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Pure Attitude" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Club Diver" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
